title: in the schedule to this Order, which immediately before this day was vested in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013 

(Property Vesting Day) (No. 2) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited water service (no 2) act 2013 (property vesting day) (no 2) order 2022

title: in the schedule to this Order, which immediately before this day was vested in
heading: 2. The 31st October 2022 shall be a “property vesting day” for the
text_raw:
2. The 31st October 2022 shall be a “property vesting day” for the 
purposes of section 12 of the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013 (No. 50 of 
2013).
text_norm: 2 31st october 2022 shall property vesting day purpose section 12 water service (no 2) act 2013 (no 50 2013)

title: in the schedule to this Order, which immediately before this day was vested in
heading: 3. On the property vesting day referred to in article 2, the property listed
text_raw:
3. On the property vesting day referred to in article 2, the property listed 
in the schedule to this Order, which immediately before this day was vested in 
a water services authority, shall stand vested in Irish Water. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th October 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [499] 3
text_norm: 3 property vesting day referred article 2 property listed schedule order immediately day vested water service authority shall stand vested irish water notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th october 2022 499 3

title: in the schedule to this Order, which immediately before this day was vested in
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Statutory Instrument gives effect to the decision of the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage to transfer the property listed in the 
schedule to the Order from water services authorities to Irish Water in 
accordance with section 12 of the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 12 [499]
